title: Assam PSC Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 50 Assistant Engineer Posts
description: The Assam Public Service Commission (Assam PSC) has declared the latest job notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 50 Assistant Engineer Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech. in Mechanical Engineering, Civil Engineering can grab this chance and apply for the Assam PSC Recruitment 2025 . Here, we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidate...
